text: Is it true that there is no way to edit the HTML for the dnd sections, rows, etc ?  I need it to work with a company-wide CSS library and components used in all of our digital products.

Yeah I don't believe you can modify HubSpot's dnd wrappers.

But you can set up full-width and 0 padding / margin on any DnD sections, which allows you to utilize full width in the editor. This way any other CSS library or layouts layered in through custom modules works totally fine....
You can also add a custom class to {% dnd_section %} which may be helpful for something like a CSS reset if you run into any conflicts.
Thanks! I think that should be good enough for what we are working on.
And adding my own CSS for those wrappers.
